title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4244.12 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4244.12 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) A nonrefundable
application fee of $250 must be paid to the corporation before final review of
an application can be completed. (b) The corporation will assess an administrative fee of up to two percent of the
project loan payable upon acceptance of commitment with one percent rebated at
closing. The corporation may allocate the administrative fee to cover
project-related expenses it deems appropriate. The applicant may be obligated
to pay for expenses incurred by the corporation and related to the project, including, but not limited to, expenses related to appraisals, surveys, title
insurance credit searches, filing fees, public hearing expenses and other
requirements deemed appropriate by the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4244.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
